description: Right now if you have an allocated (to project/tenant) ip which is associated to a fixed ip, and you deallocate the ip from the project - the floating ip remains associated with the fixed ip.
title: Floating IPs API extension should disassociate floating ips from fixed when deallocating from a project

comments.content: Right now if you have an allocated (to project/tenant) ip which is associated to a fixed ip, and you deallocate the ip from the project - the floating ip remains associated with the fixed ip.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jakedahn
